title: Teary-eyed, former miner talks dangers at ex-coal CEO's mine
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
Choking back tears, a former coal miner testified Tuesday that during Don Blankenship's reign atop Massey Energy, a "code of silence" about ...
